tact.name: Nox Gas Trap
tact.desc: Drop Canisters that release deadly Nox gas when shot or triggered by enemies

pass.name: Nox Vision
pass.desc: Allows you to see enemies through Nox gas

ult.name: Nox Gas Grenade
ult.desc: Blankets a large area in Nox gas

tact.name: Pysche Out
tact.desc: Send out a holographic decoy to confuse the enemy

pass.name: Encore!
pass.desc: Automatically drop a decoy and cloak for five seconds when knocked down

ult.name: Vanishing Act
ult.desc: Deploy a team of Decoys to distract enemies while you cloak

tact.name: Grappling Hook
tact.desc: Grapple to get to out-of-reach places quickly

pass.name: Insider Knowledge
pass.desc: Scan a survey beacon to reveal the ring's next location

ult.name: Zipline Gun
ult.desc: Create a zipline for everyone to use

tact.name: Into the Void
tact.desc: Reposition quickly through the safety of void space, avoiding all damage

pass.name: Voices From The Void
pass.desc: A voice warns you when danger approaches. As far as you can tell, it's on your side

ult.name: Dimensional Rift
ult.desc: Link two locations with portals for 60 seconds, allowing anyone to use them

tact.name: Stim
tact.desc: Move 30% faster for six seconds. Costs health to use

ult.name: Launch Pad
ult.desc: Deploy a jump pad that catapults teammates through the air

tact.name: Eye of the Allfather
tact.desc: Briefly reveal hidden enemies, traps, and clues throughout structures ahead of you

pass.name: Tracker
pass.desc: See tracks left behind by your foes

ult.name: Beast of the Hunt
ult.desc: Enhances your senses, allowing you to move faster and highlighting your prey

tact.name: Smoke Launcher
tact.desc: Fire a high-velocity smoke canister that explodes into a smoke wall on impact

pass.name: Double Time
pass.desc: Taking fire while sprinting makes you move faster for a brief time

ult.name: Rolling Thunder
ult.desc: Call in an artillery strike that slowly creeps across the landscape

tact.name: D.O.C. Heal Drone
tact.desc: Call your Drone of Compassion to automatically heal nearby players over time

pass.name: Combat Medic
pass.desc: Revive knocked down teammates faster while protected by a shield wall. Healing items are used 25% faster

ult.name: Care Package
ult.desc: Call in a drop pod with a combination of 3 high-quality attachments, consumables, and/or gear

tact.name: Dome of Protection
tact.desc: Throw down a dome-shield that blocks attacks for 15 seconds

pass.name: Gun Shield
pass.desc: Aiming down sights deploys a gun shield that blocks incoming fire

ult.name: Defensive Bombardment
ult.desc: Call in a concentrated mortar strike on a marked position
